title: Date: 19/06-2017 - Unable to connect to the login que?
body:
So I haven't played in 2 weeks - Just tried now, on both of my accounts.

Please advice.

replies.body: Riot is messing with the client and reports the issues after 1 hour and lets u bang u`r head to a monitor until u bleed and after they give a orange warning that they think there is something wrong on their side and wait for it, it`s getting even better if u wait another 1 hour that warning becomes red. LACK OF COMPETENCE... NOT THE 1st TIME OR THE SECOND!

Network Operations – a minute ago
We're aware of a problem causing login attempts to fail, and are working on a fix.
This just keeps happening as of late. I wonder why.

We've had a couple login issues over the past few days, and it looks like this issue is mostly centered around a certain file on your pc. Check out the sticky we have and try the steps listed there. If that doesn't help, reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a few other steps that should help!

I had an isp internet issue that I solved by connecting to my mobile one but still this sucks 
I TRY TO LOGIN FOR 1 HOUR AGAIN AND AGAIN!!!!

Yesterday I still could play (22:00 GMT+2), today I tried logging, shows I am not able to connect, I check client status on web, all seems to be working, already changed DNS in Internet Explorer settings to the ones from Google, still nothing.

I have not been running updates yesterday, I'm using win 7, cannot connect using LoL with Polish nor English settings. Removing gameflow patchlock does not give results.

EDIT:
Its working now. Maybe was not accepting my connectivity to queue? Thank you support
{{champion:99}}
Same issue for both NE and EUW
i changed my password just thought i forgot it but its a big client problem hope riot will see and fix that problem
I have the same problem, anyone got information on this? Why cant we log in?
guys cant sing in whats the problem( eu west)
